Name: PlayWith
About the game: Everyone got used to regular controls, wasd/zqsd/Arrow Keys But how much are we used to that PlayWith is a 2D hardcore platform game where every level have a different key binding Did you ever jumped with 'Y', got to the left with '5' and to the right with 'E' ? With this game you might try this kind of weird controls 30 Original Levels Enemies who wants to make your life like hell And a story about an accident...
Meta Title: PlayWith: Aug 1, 2022, Peperoni and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on PlayWith? Check out the release date (Aug 1, 2022), developer insights from Peperoni, and a complete game summary.
